article.title: Alphonso_I_of_Spain
article.paragraph: There has not been a monarch known asAlphonsoorAlfonso I of Spain, the first king of that name of the unified Spain beingAlfonso XII of Spain(18741885).
Several precursor kingdoms have had anAlfonso I. You may be looking for:

list.listitem: Alfonso I of Aragonand Navarre (11041134), known asthe Battler
Alfonso II of Aragon, a.k.a. Alfons I, Count of Barcelona, (11621196) known asel Cast (the Chaste)orel Trobador (the Troubadour)
